page.title: 05THE CAMPSITE NEAR ANDOVER
page.content: As well as running a small farm rearing beef livestock, the Read family have, since the early 1950's, managed a{seven acre campsite}just outside{Picket Piece.}On the day of our visit it was very hot and life seemed relaxed, but we were soon reminded just how demanding the work is. With only the family to run both the farm and the site life is always busy. The camping area, with its{many {facilities,}can cater for over a hundred campers, is open{all the year {round,}and attracts{visitors from all {over the world.}This means that getting away for even a short break can prove almost impossible. Nevertheless, even though they hardly ever manage a holiday, the Reads don't begrudge the rest of us our increased leisure time. After all, it's good for business !
